welcome: Welcome to RandkaKlik! Here you will find friends and your other half
privacy_policy: Your data is protected. We do not share it with third parties. Storage is carried out on our servers.
location_question: Where are you from? (Add your geolocation, otherwise we won't be able to match you with suitable profiles)
age_too_young: Sorry, but you haven't reached the minimum age to use the app.
profile_not_found: Your profile was not found. Would you like to create one?
no_profiles: There are no profiles for you, try again later
complaint_to_admin: Thank you. The administrator will check this profile.
complaint_failed: Error. Action is only available while viewing a profile.
error_not_premium: To be able to write without matches, a Premium subscription is required. Go to /premium to purchase.
limit_off: You've exhausted your limit for today.
premium_message: You can write without matches only once a day. Are you sure this is the right time?
like_limit_reached: You've reached your like limit. Go to the page to get additional likes:
premium_likes: You've reached your like limit. Additional likes can be obtained with the Premium package. Go to the page to get additional likes:
new_message: You have a new message from
sended_message: Your message has been sent successfully
shure_delete_profile: Are you sure you want to delete your profile? This action cannot be undone.
last_message_delete_user: Sorry to see you go. We hope you've achieved your goal. If you want to return, we're always here. /start
extra_likes_unavailable: You've already used additional likes or cannot activate them.
conversation_started: You can start a chat with
conversation_not_started: Impossible to start a conversation with this user. Perhaps the conversation was ended earlier or the match is unavailable.
chat_partner_not_found: Error: Chat partner not found. The conversation has already been ended.
no_active_conversation: You have no active conversation to end.
feature_used_today: You've already used this feature today.
extra_likes_confirm: Confirm transition to activate additional likes:
contact_admin_for_premium: Contact the administrator to purchase the Premium package:
profile_hidden: Your profile is hidden from other users. To make it visible, click 'View Profiles', then select ‚õî.
profile_shown: Your profile is now visible to other users.
